sn47.19:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sumbhesu viharati sedakaṃ nāma sumbhānaṃ nigamo.
sn47.19:4.3: “bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, caṇḍālavaṃsiko caṇḍālavaṃsaṃ ussāpetvā medakathālikaṃ antevāsiṃ āmantesi:
sn47.19:4.4: ‘ehi tvaṃ, samma medakathālike, caṇḍālavaṃsaṃ abhiruhitvā mama uparikhandhe tiṭṭhāhī’ti.
sn47.19:4.5: ‘Evaṃ, ācariyā’ti kho, bhikkhave, medakathālikā antevāsī caṇḍālavaṃsikassa paṭissutvā caṇḍālavaṃsaṃ abhiruhitvā ācariyassa uparikhandhe aṭṭhāsi.
sn47.19:4.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, caṇḍālavaṃsiko medakathālikaṃ antevāsiṃ etadavoca:
sn47.19:4.7: ‘tvaṃ, samma medakathālike, mamaṃ rakkha, ahaṃ taṃ rakkhissāmi.
sn47.19:4.8: Evaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ guttā aññamaññaṃ rakkhitā sippāni ceva dassessāma, lābhañca lacchāma, sotthinā ca caṇḍālavaṃsā orohissāmā’ti.
sn47.19:4.9: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, medakathālikā antevāsī caṇḍālavaṃsikaṃ etadavoca:
sn47.19:4.11: Tvaṃ, ācariya, attānaṃ rakkha, ahaṃ attānaṃ rakkhissāmi.
sn47.19:4.12: Evaṃ mayaṃ attaguttā attarakkhitā sippāni ceva dassessāma, lābhañca lacchāma, sotthinā ca caṇḍālavaṃsā orohissāmā’”ti.
sn47.19:5.1: “So tattha ñāyo”ti bhagavā etadavoca, “yathā medakathālikā antevāsī ācariyaṃ avoca.
sn47.19:5.4: Attānaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati.
sn47.19:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati?
sn47.19:6.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati.
sn47.19:6.4: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati?
sn47.19:6.6: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati.
sn47.19:6.9: Attānaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī”ti.
